author: mriou
msg: Added dependency toward derby jpa db in the pom as using it in build.xml isn't enough.

author: awiner
msg: JSF 1.2 and af:forEach:  work around an as-yet not understood
problem with using the JSP ELContext to evaluate ValueExpressions.
A simple List property of a managed bean is not properly being
retrieved when going through JSPs (null is retrieved), but comes
back fine when passing the JSF ELContext, at least in the recent-ish
build of Glassfish I'm testing with at the moment.

author: mikem
msg: DERBY-2183: Trigger recompilation problem when not qualified with schema
backporting fix from trunk to 10.1 branch.
This patch was contributed by Yip Ng (yipng168@gmail.com)
The problem was that the compilation schema for the SPS was never set
during its recompilation, it was using the current schema to perform the
recompilation which is not correct. It should have use the SPS's
compilation schema to do the recompilation when we push the compiler context.

author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-2686 register ModuleConfigurers, port from trunk. I can't find an openejb version to go with 1.2, so openejb may not compile

msg: Use the same directories layout (m2) as in the bundled plugins
